books.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: written records of the financial accounts of a business
books.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: An accountant will examine the company’s books.
a small firm that is having problems balancing the books (=keeping its profits and spending equal)
They have £50 billion worth of orders on the books.
books.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the names of people who use a company’s services, or who are sent by a company to work for other people
books.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: an agent with a lot of popular actors on his books
